title: Things You Need To Pack For A Camping Trip (kohen karma)
text: By kohen karma Jul 19, 2015 Camping in the boondocks can be a great way to spend a relaxing weekend after a hectic week. You can go for shopping in a mall or can party in a fancy pub, but nothing can match the peace you will get in nature's lap. A serene natural retreat can take away all the stress that you have carried inside for a long time. In this concrete city jungle, you hardly get time to breathe in some fresh air. Camping can be a great way to nourish your body and soul with some fresh air and food that you can cook in an open barbeque kitchen. The fresh air and scenic natural landscape will certainly give you a break from the hectic city life. Therefore, if you have time then go for a camping trip this weekend.Basic Backpack UtilitiesIf you have decided to go on a camping trip then it is suggested to pack some essential utilities. Firstly, it is very important to understand that you are not going to a resort, and there will be many things that you would not get in jungle. You cannot survive in wilderness without few things. You must carry some essential things in your bag, to stay safe and healthy during the trip. First aid kit is quite necessary to survive in perilous situations and you must have one in your backpack. You should carry medicines for common ailments like nausea, diarrhea, cold, and fever. You cannot persevere without food and it is essential to have some easy to cook food products. Apart from this, you should also carry some ready to eat snacks and energy bars to munch during the trip. Comfortable clothes and shoes are also necessary for camping trips. You should also buy some camping tents and beddings for the trip.KnifeJungle is not a safe place and you must carry some basic weapons in your bag. You must have heard about the tradition of carrying a bullet knife in pocket, during camping trips. This little knife is not just a safety weapon, but is also a very essential camping utility. You can use it for tasks like rope cutting and meat chopping. You must have a pocket knife or remington butterfly knife in your bag. This knife can be quite useful and you can easily find one in any nearby convenience store. Apart from all this, it is suggested to keep a licensed gun in your bag for handling precarious situations during the trip.
